Broken love relationship but with a gentle fond remembrance of each other. Wishing the best for each other. Closure in this relationship is positive. In the first verse the singer states how he understands the pain when they broke up as they did not do so under the best circumstances, and at first did not wish he well. In the chorus, he starts to remember better times when they would stay up late talking, or parked on a date in his car. At the time they were so in love they could not wait to see each other the next day. Now that he has had time to reflect, he wishes her the best.
